Attributes.description: Introduction to basic theories of non-associative learning, classical and operant conditioning. Experimental findings from behavioural and biological analyses with animals and humans.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of BIOL 260, BIOL 361, BIOL 455, BIOL 458, CAPS 301, NSCI 201, PSYC 260, PSYC 263, PSYC 270, PSYC 304.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon Wed Fri, Start Time: 13:00, End Time: 14:00, Building: Hennings, Room: 201
